question: "'The Doors' generated a controversy with the single ""Hello, I Love You"" in 1968 when the press pointed out it's resemblance to the 1965 hit ""All Day and All of the Night"" of which band?"
vanilla_rag_result: The controversy with the single "Hello, I Love You" in 1968 was generated when the press pointed out its resemblance to the 1965 hit "All Day and All of the Night" by the Kinks.
